DOC.brief_summary: This study is evaluating the potential antidepressive effect of a 4 week treatment protocol using the H-coil deep TMS device in bipolar depression.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the H-Coil Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (TMS) Device in the Treatment of Bipolar Depression
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of bipolar depression No other axis I disorder Risk factors for convulsions
